subject: Entrepreneurship
title: What Is Lean Startup?
description: A short lesson to help you apply What Is Lean Startup?.

hook.text: In 2008, Eric Ries published a blog post that changed how a generation of founders build companies.

buildup.text: Ries had spent years at IMVU building features nobody used. Months of work, zero traction.

discovery.text: He combined Toyota's lean manufacturing with Steve Blank's customer development into one framework.

twist.text: The idea was radical: treat your startup like a science experiment, not a business plan.

climax.text: His 2011 book 'The Lean Startup' sold over a million copies and reshaped Silicon Valley's culture.

quiz.question: What two disciplines did Eric Ries combine to create the lean startup method?
options: Agile software development and venture capital theory
